# Preparation 
```{r}
#| message: FALSE
here::i_am("r-101-grade-analysis.Rproj")
library(here)
library(vroom)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

# Question 1 
```{r}
grades <- vroom(here("grades.csv"))
```
# Question 2
```{r}
grades |> 
  filter(!is.na(Exam))|> 
  summarise( min = min(Exam), max = max(Exam), median = median(Exam), mean = mean(Exam))|> 
  knitr::kable()
  
```

# Question 3
```{r}
 nb_na <- sum(is.na(grades$Exam))
```

`r nb_na` students did not take the final exam.

# Question 4

```{r}
grades |> 
  filter(!is.na(Exam))|> 
  ggplot(aes(x = Exam), is.na = TRUE)+ geom_histogram()
```

# Question 5 

```{r}
count_grp <- 
  grades |> 
  group_by(Group) |>
  summarise(count = n())
knitr::kable(count_grp)
```
# Question 6 

```{r}
ggplot(count_grp, aes(x= Group, y = count ))+
  geom_point()
```

# Question 7 

```{r}
grades |> 
  filter(!is.na(Exam))|> 
  group_by(Group, Exam)|> 
  ggplot(aes(x = Exam))+ geom_bar(fill = `Group`)
```
